channel.title: Windows 7 problem?
channel.description:
I got a problem with my program in add/remove programs
it only shows 18 programs but i have more than that but they're all still installed and they all still work but they just don't show in the list here's a screenie
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/28i3g1v.png[/img]
anyone know how to fix?

item.title: Windows 7 problem?
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

the applications simply arent adding an entry to the registry, nothing to do with your windows 7 installation

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 7 problem?
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

No, if the program isnt a piece of shit it should ethier have a uninstall shortcut in the startmenu or a uninstaller in the C:/Program Files/(Program name).

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 7 problem?
item.dc:creator: @DuhPk DuhPk
item.description:
@DuhPk wrote:

mwiebelhaus:

Just because a program is installed doesn’t mean it has to register with add/remove programs.

Alright well yesterday they were all there but I installed hypercam 2 and then it just went like that, I’m just wondering why, This shouldn’t affect my computer at all right? like the way the programs run

Read full topic

item.title: Windows 7 problem?
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

Just because a program is installed doesn’t mean it has to register with add/remove programs.

Read full topic
